name: Beasts Of The Nordic Seas
description:
Try to kill everyone in this boss rush with art from old nautical maps!

THE LESS HEATH YOU HAVE THE FASTER YOU BECOME!

controls: 

  • move - arrow keys / wasd
  • shoot - x and z / mouse
  • show map - m

////////////////////////////////

  • credits: art taken from old maps and edited by me
  • Map: harvard college library
  • Music: The Buccaneer's Haul by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
  • Ocean music, landslide: Zapsplat.com
  •  canon: freesoundeffects.com 
  • font: BlackChancery by Doug Miles, 1001fonts.com
  • end painting: Independence Day Celebration in Centre Square, Philadelphia by John Lewis Krimmel
